'''Scroll of the Fiery Firmament''' is an [[Item]] used to unlock the [[Tletl Ilhuicatl]] realm layout in the [[Serenitea Pot]]. It can be purchased from [[Tubby]] in the [[Realm Depot]] after completing the {{Quest|Flowers Resplendent on the Sun-Scorched Sojourn}}.
